home.title: Parq Casino Canada: Premier Vancouver Entertainment Destination
home.description: Parq Casino Canada offers an exceptional land-based gaming experience in Vancouver. Enjoy 24/7 excitement with hundreds of slot machines, exclusive table games, fine dining, and luxury hotels: all in one vibrant entertainment complex.

blocks.text: Parq Casino Canada: A Full Range of Opportunities for Gambling and Relaxation

items: comprehensive leisure facilities
over 600 slot machines
sports betting lounge

blocks.text: Parq Casino Canada is one of the most famous land-based casinos in the country that is situated in the center of Vancouver, British Columbia. The casino lies in the posh Parq Vancouver entertainment complex that is a combination of gaming, restaurants, bars, two world hotels and conference facilities. This location was designed as a representation of the new leisure, the fusion of luxurious design and the atmosphere of adventure and relaxation.

Although Parq Casino is not an online casino, its official site enables individuals to get acquainted with all their services, offers, and discounts. On the Internet, one can enroll into the bonus system, see the schedule of the event, and even reserve a room at the hotel that is situated directly over the gaming halls.
How to Login to Parq Casino

At Parq Casino the process of logging in is very uncomplicated although very safe. This casino is open daily. Nonetheless, customers have to check their age in order to enter the gaming rooms. Any person below the age of 19 is not allowed at the casino. This is in accordance with the strict gambling laws in Britain Columbia.

Security staff will be available to receive new customers at the entrance. All they need to do is to show a photo of identification with the year they were born. It can be a national or international passport, a Canadian citizenship card or a national or international driver license.

Customers must also observe a smart casual style of dressing besides showing identification. That is why it is better not to include sportswear, beachwear, torn jeans, hats, T-shirts with improper slogans and symbols, etc. in your wardrobe. Some simple etiquette also should be followed:

items: do not disturb other guests;
do not use phones at the gaming tables;
do not take photos or videos, etc.

blocks.text: Courtesy and respectful behavior are an important and integral part of the Parq Casino atmosphere.
Advantages and Disadvantages of Parq Casino
Parq Casino attracts tens of thousands of customers annually. Such impressive attendance is easily explained by the advantages and unique opportunities this entertainment complex offers its guests.
However, for new and potential customers, an objective assessment of Parq Casino is crucial. Therefore, in addition to the advantages, it is also important to consider some disadvantages.
Advantages

items: The size of the casino and the variety of entertainment;
Slot machines, table games, tournaments, sports betting;
Separate poker rooms and poker tournaments;
Convenient location in downtown Vancouver on the picturesque waterfront;
High level of service: bars, restaurants, lounge areas, two hotels;
Informative official website and loyalty program.

blocks.text: Disadvantages

items: Online play is not allowed: this is a land-based casino only;
Relatively high starting stakes in premium rooms;
Parking may be subject to a fee for new customers.

blocks.text: Games at Parq Casino

The unquestionable strength of such gambling houses is, of course, the unbelievable variety of the game choices. It is equipped with multiple slots, table games, professional live dealers, sports betting, and many others.
Slots

Parq Casino has a variety of slot machines exceeding 600 modern slot machines such as traditional slot machines and the new video slot machines with progressive jackpots. You will have slots by major developers of the world like Aristocrat, IGT, and Konami.
Table Games

The casino has about 75 table games that include table games such as roulette, blackjack, baccarat, and craps. Tables are separated by the amount of betting, so you could select the space that suits you well, beginning with quiet spots and going all the way to VIP rooms.
Poker

Poker players also have a separate section in Parq Casino where Texas Hold’em and Omaha tournaments are regularly organized. The rooms are furnished to the maximum, with comfortable chairs and monitors as well as a service system.
High Limit Gaming

The High Limit section is intended to serve the high-end patrons. Its interior is lavish, there is gentle lighting and personalized service. It has blackjack and baccarat exclusive slot machines and tables.
Sportsbook Lounge

Parq Casino also has a modern Sportsbook Lounge where live sporting events will take place on big screens and you can place your bets. The sports club atmosphere is produced with the drinking and snacks bar area.
Bonuses for Parq Casino Clients
Parq Casino regularly runs various bonus programs and promotional offers. Consider the promotional periods and draw times to maximize your benefits and gifts.
KOI Ultimate Smart Bundle Giveaway
By participating in the King's Bounty bonus, casino guests receive ballots for winnings to enter a drawing for C$2,500 in Table Free Play or the Ultimate Smart Bundle.
The Holiday Beat Giveaway

As part of this holiday promotion, one lucky winner can win the latest Apple AirPods Pro (3rd generation) or C$200 cash. Participation is based on playing under certain conditions during the specified period.
Lucky 8 E-Bac Bonus

From Monday to Thursday at 8:00 PM, a Touch-Bet Baccarat drawing will take place: each participant who earns at least 20 Encore points between 5:00 PM and 8:00 PM will receive C$10 Free Play, and one winner will receive C$100 Free Slot Play.
Weekly Football Pick'Em - Chance at C$10,000
A seasonal promotion is starting in the Proline Sportsbook Lounge, where participants can claim C$10,000 in cash for correct NFL game predictions.
Join Encore Rewards for a C$10 Free Play
New members of the Encore Rewards loyalty program are offered a C$10 casino game (Free Play) upon joining.
Parq Casino Deposit Methods

As a land-based casino, all financial transactions are conducted exclusively on-site. Deposits are available in several ways: cash, debit, or credit card. VIP guests have access to a separate service area where they can deposit via bank transfer or use a personal cashier.

Parq Casino also offers a "front money" system, allowing players to pre-fund their gaming account before their visit. This is especially convenient for regular customers visiting from other regions of Canada or from abroad.
Parq Casino Withdrawal Methods

Winnings are withdrawn on-site at the casino's cashiers. After finishing the game, the player presents the chip or receipt received from the dealer and receives their winnings in cash. For larger amounts, the administration may offer a bank transfer or check.

Members of the Encore Rewards program have more advantages. The more bonus you earn, the more you could add to your bonus account, which could be redeemed to cover your accommodation, meals, and other services at Parq Vancouver.
Parq Casino License

Parq Casino operates in strict compliance with Canadian law and meets all requirements of the British Columbia Gaming Commission. This makes games at Parq Casino completely safe, transparent, and reliable.
Parq Casino App

The mobile web site allows the visitors to know about the up-coming tournaments, timings, rules of games, and its existing bonuses and offers. They also have the opportunity to enroll to the loyalty program or reserve a room in any of the hotels of Parq Vancouver directly on the phone. This renders the mobile version of the site a full-fledged substitute of any app.
The primary official application in the Parq casino is the Encore Rewards App. This loyalty program is used in the whole British Columbia casino network and is actively used in Parq Vancouver.
Using the app, you can:

items: look at the balance in your bonus points;
track your membership level;
receive exclusive offers;
get updates of the new offers and events.

blocks.text: Encore Rewards App is free to download in the App Store and on Google Play by searching the name of the app.
Available Currencies at Parq Casino

The currency accepted in Parq Casino is Canadian dollar (CAD). Betting, winnings and transactions are carried out in Canadian currency. This is the norm of land-based casinos that are run by the British Columbia Lottery Corporation (BCLC).

Currency exchange offices are also close to international guests and in other instances, there are also banks based in downtown Vancouver. The Parq hotel and restaurants also accept international credit cards, like Visa, MasterCard and American Express, as a form of payment.
Parq Casino Languages

The main service language at Parq Casino is English, which is applicable to the business and tourist orientation of the city of Vancouver. Nevertheless, the casino employees are internationally educated, and are able to assist the guests in Chinese (Mandarin and Cantonese), French, and Portuguese.
Parq Casino Support Team
The support staff of the Parq Casino is very professional. Guests are able to receive advice either on phone, email, and face-to-face at the information desk within the gaming room.
The team answers questions about membership, bonuses, game schedules, and rules of conduct. A Contact Us section is also available on the website, where you can submit a request via an online form.
FAQ About Parq Casino
Where is Parq Casino located?
The casino is in Vancouver, 39 Smithe Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, which is close to False Creek and the BC Place Stadium.
Can I play online?
No, there is no online gaming platform for the casino. Nevertheless, the official site and the Encore Rewards app help keep you updated with the promotions, bonuses, and news.
How old should one be in order to enter the casino?
The required age of the visitor is 19 years old as stipulated by the British Columbia law.
Is there a dress code?
Yes, there is a need for smart casual clothing. There are no track suits, hats, or beach attire.
Does it take foreign cards at the casino?
Yes, the international bank cards are accepted in restaurants, bars and hotels. Only deposits are made in Canadian dollars.

games.title: Parq Casino Canada Games: Slots, Tables, and Live Poker Action
games.description: Parq Casino Canada features over 600 slot machines, 75 table games, and a lively poker room. Experience the thrill of blackjack, roulette, baccarat, and exclusive tournaments in Vancouver’s top-tier gaming destination.

blocks.text: Parq Casino Canada Games: World of Gambling and Entertainment in the Centre of Vancouver

The Parq Casino Canada is among the most colorful as well as the contemporary casinos in Canada and it is situated in downtown Vancouver, British Columbia. The complex is well known with its magnificent internal atmosphere, premium service, and a variety of entertainment services. It has thousands of slot machines, dozens of table games, a comfortable poker room, and a separate section of supporters of sports betting.
Parq Casino Slots

The Parq Casino Canada slots room is the central point of the casino. It has more than 1,550 modern slot machines, and the possibilities of winning have a great variety of different topics, gambling levels, and mechanics. They are chosen between the traditional three-reel slot machines to the recent video slot with the interactive bonus game and the progressive jackpot.
The game area is also created in such a way that all gamers feel comfortable: large aisles, low-level lighting, and distinct sections of various types of games. Some of the popular slot machines are:

items: Buffalo Gold;
Lightening Link;
Dragon Link;
Wheel of Fortune;
Cleopatra, etc.

blocks.text: With the convenient Encore Rewards system, players receive points each spin which is redeemed to receive free credits, gifts or custom raffles.
Table Games in Parq Casino

In case you like dynamic games and playing with the real dealer, the Table Games room at Parq Casino will become your favorite. It offers a wide variety of more than 85 table games, including the classics, such as Blackjack, Roulette, Baccarat and Craps.

The staffing of every table is done by seasoned dealers who have been trained according to the standards of Caesars Entertainment. The feeling of the table room is a mix of the elegant and the exciting: the soft lighting, luxurious finishes and the attentive staff makes the atmosphere of privacy and comfort.

Blackjack is also very popular where players will be able to challenge their skills and strategy. To the gamblers who like to play on the spur of the moment, there are the American and French roulette. The self-confessed Eastern gambling enthusiasts will enjoy Baccarat where one bets in favor of the player or the bank.
Parq Casino Poker Rooms and Tables

The Parq Casino Canada poker room is a world of its own and it is designed to suit individuals who value the intellectual aspect of gambling. Here, there is an air of concentration and planning, and each flop may alter the result of the hand.

The room is furnished with comfortable tables, professional lighting and plush chairs so that one can enjoy the playing experience even when taking long hours. The poker room has regular Texas Hold'em and Omaha tournaments, large guarantee and loose limit cash games.

Gamers are offered the opportunity to exploit high-tier dealers and receive table service, drinks, and snacks. It is a friendly but competitive environment: newcomers are always welcome, and the advanced players are polite to their opponents.
High Limit Gaming in Parq Casino

Parq Casino also has a High Limit Gaming area where those who like to gamble with more money and in private can do so. This is an exclusive club, one that has been done up in modern fashion with focus on comfort and exclusiveness, furnished with the best slot machines and isolated high-limit blackjack and baccarat tables. The club members of this region will enjoy the services of personal servants, personal hosts and some other facilities, including a private bar and expedited conversion of chips.

The High Limit Room is the right place to be when one wants to enjoy the luxury, privacy and maximum excitement. It provides the atmosphere of a VIP-guest where all the guests feel to be the members of one exclusive club: low light, silence, attentional staff and exclusive club aura.
Sportsbook Lounge For Parq Casino Clients

The other attraction at Parq casino Vancouver is the Sportsbook Lounge where the experience of excitement is combined with a feeling of sporting competition. In this case, the guests are not only able to see the live broadcasts of the largest tournaments in the world but also bet on sports with the help of partner services.
The lounge will be fitted with huge HD screens, cozy seats and a well-furnished bar. It establishes a special atmosphere uniting fans of different teams and lovers of active betting.

The NFL, NHL, NBA, MLB, UFC, and other leagues can also be followed and special offers are available to the visitor in regards to sporting activities. During big matches the Sportsbook Lounge is full of the vibe of the arena: crazy moods, cheers and the feeling of collectivity.

Parq Casino Canada is not only a gambling place but a world of entertainment where technology, style and vibrant excitement are combined. In this case, each person will be able to find something to his liking: slots and table games are available as well as poker and sports gambling.

blocks.text: Parq Casino Canada App: Everything about the Casino in Your Smartphone.

Although Parq casino Canada is a land-based casino mainly situated in the centre of Vancouver, visitors tend to find a way of engaging it through the internet. It could be at first sight that an enterprise as big as a gaming complex would also have its own mobile application, yet there is no official Parq Casino application.

Nevertheless, it is not a negative point. The casino has a modernized and fully adapted mobile version of the official site of the casino, where all the information and online services are easily accessible. This solution appears to be more convenient and adaptable to the times when a majority of the users use smartphones over laptops.
Parq Casino Mobile Website

The casino site is not just a business card, it is an actual online map of the whole complex. The mobile version of the Parq Casino Canada can easily fit in the screen of any phone or tablet regardless of whether it is an iPhone, Android smartphone, or a tablet. It preserves the signature design of the brand, easy navigation and the rapid access to the sections that guests choose to be important.

Through the website, users can access all the details concerning the casino, restaurants, hotel and events scheduled. This is particularly handy when the tourists organize their trip beforehand and are interested in renting a room, getting to know about the existing offers, or getting to know the regulations of visiting.

Its mobile version of the site is available on any browser: Google Chrome, Safari, Firefox, or Edge and does not need any extra software. This saves space in the devices and enables current information in the absence of updates or downloads.
What Information Does Mobile Parq Casino Contain
With mobile Parq Casino Canada, guests will be able to:

items: See diagrams of over 1,500 slot machines and 75 table games, such as blackjack, roulette and poker;
See the program, concerts, and gourmet festivals that will be held on the territory of the complex;
Get information of restaurants, lounges, and VIP rooms;
Get acquainted with the etiquette of visiting, such as mode of dressing and age limits;
Get up-to-date deals and offers at the casino and hotel.

blocks.text: The main benefit of the mobile site is the ability to access the Encore Rewards loyalty program, which is directly related to Parq Casino. In the site, you can get to know the levels, perks, and even get the official member app.
Encore Rewards Mobile App
The Encore Rewards program is one of the most important digital functions at the Parq Casino. It is the players official club of bonuses in any of the casinos in British Columbia.

The Parq Casino is an active participant in this program and provides its clients with a chance to get exclusive bonuses, discounts, and exclusive events and offers. All this is operated with the help of a specific Encore Rewards mobile application.
Encore Rewards and Parq Casino

Encore Rewards app is directly affiliated to Parq Casino Vancouver. Any visitor coming to the program may connect their card to their account and monitor the progress of the points earned on playing games, getting food in restaurants, and booking a hotel.

Every time the user visits the Parq casino, he or she would receive Encore points that can be redeemed into chips, free dinners, hotel accommodation or even in sweepstakes. The guests also get updated on new offers and special deals offered by the program through the app.

The primary benefit of the Encore Rewards app is that it is easy to use and customizable. The user-friendly interface of the app helps to check the balance of bonus points, status level (Silver, Gold, Elite), and the history of activity quickly.
The app also allows you to:

items: Get notified of new promotions instantly at Parq casino Canada;
Check out events and specials to your rank;
Carry an electronic membership card, rather than a plastic one;
Control your personal settings and preferences using your smartphone.

blocks.text: That is why Encore Rewards is not only a bonus system but a complex means of communication with the casino and facilitating the user experience.
Installing the Encore App

The Encore Rewards app is absolutely free to download both via official sources: the App Store (iOS) and Google Play (Android). The app is not bulky, it is easy to install and does not involve a complex process of registration.

The only thing to do to begin using it is to create an account by providing your name, email, and phone number. Once this is done, the system will invite you to become a program member and associate an actual or virtual Encore Rewards card.
The app is fully secure, certified and will assist in all the current data protection protocols. It is constantly updated and the support of the user is provided in English and French.

login.title: Parq Casino Canada Login: Access Rewards and Exclusive Benefits

blocks.text: Parq Casino Canada Login: Entry and Conduct Rules for Vancouver Casino Guests

A visit to Parq Casino Canada, located in downtown Vancouver, British Columbia, begins with a simple yet strictly regulated login process. Unlike online platforms, "login" here does not require entering an email and password, but rather a physical registration upon entering the casino. Every guest undergoes identity and age verification.
How to Login to Parq Casino
To gain entry, you must present a valid form of identification. This may include:

items: a Canadian driver's license,
a passport,
or any other official identification with a photo and date of birth.

blocks.text: The legal age of access to the casino is 19 years, which is relevant to the British Columbia legislation. Security employees are allowed to check the authenticity of the document and request additional interrogations.

Once the guests have checked their age, they go through the entrance section and the encore rewards registration desks are situated there. In this case, it is possible to receive an account with bonus points, discounts, and exclusive invitations. Registration only requires a few minutes: you only need to fill in your name, telephone, and email.

It should be noted that you cannot log in to Parq Casino Vancouver without visiting it. No remote or online login since it is a land based establishment. Nevertheless, a significant number of guests visit the official site or the mobile version where they check what is planned and what can happen during the event or order a table or get the information about games and offers.
Current Dress Code
The acceptable ones include the following:

items: no fading shorts or dark jeans,
shirts, plain T-shirts, blouses,
shoes, boots or classic sneakers.

blocks.text: The prohibited ones are:

items: sports uniforms and shorts,
beachwear and tank tops,
baseball caps, headwear (with few religious exceptions),
torn or dirty clothing.

blocks.text: When the guests intend to attend the High Limit Lounge or restaurants located within the casino floor, they are likely to dress more formally: suits or evening dresses.
Parq Casino Rules of Conduct
Similar to any other high-end Canadian casino, Parq Casino follows rigid rules of behavior. These regulations will help to make the stay of all the visitors comfortable, safe, and entertaining.

To begin with, the casino does not allow aggressive and offensive conduct. Arguing loudly, using obscene words, trying to provoke, or disrupting the play of other guests will lead to an immediate warning and in case of subsequent offense, expulsion by a casino. The casino allows the use of alcoholic drinks, but drunk players will not be allowed in or they will be kicked out.

Gaming areas have a strict prohibition on photography. This is to safeguard individual data and ensure confidentiality of customers. Photos and videos can be taken at specific places of results, which are specially divided into public spaces, at the entrance or in the restaurant area.
The use of electronic devices in the gaming tables is also banned in Parq Casino. During play, smartphones, tablets and cameras should be hidden lest they are suspected of cheating.
In Which Situations Can You Be Barred at Parq Casino?
Although Parq Casino Canada has a friendly ambiance, it is at liberty to refuse any visitor in some situations. Security makes such decisions and the laws in Britain Columbia regulate them.
Primary reasons for refusal:

items: Lack of compliance with age restrictions. Children below the age of 19 years are forbidden to go inside the casino premises even when with an adult.
Lack of identification. No one enters without ID despite how this visitor looks or what intentions he or she has.
Dress code violation. In case of dressing that falls short of the casino requirements (sports uniform, beachwear or dirty clothes), you can be politely requested by the security to change or go back.
Alcoholism or unbecoming conduct. Security will examine the conduct of the guests on entering and it may refuse to allow any entry at any time because of alcohol or drugs intoxication.
Past breaking of casino regulations. Repeat offenders on the conduct policy can be entered into an internal database and their privileges can be limited over a given duration.

Self-Exclusion or Banning. Canada has a Voluntary Self-Exclusion program, and players can voluntarily limit their access to gambling. In case a visitor is on the list of the program, the access will be blocked.

blocks.text: Parq Casino Canada is more than an ID check when it comes to the entrance process, which is a key ingredient to the entire idea of an elite experience. It is all aimed at making all the guests comfortable and safe.

Dress code, etiquette, and demeaning of the employees will enable you to experience the ambience of a high-end casino in the city of Vancouver. As well as becoming a member of Encore Rewards makes a visit at Parq Casino not only a form of entertainment but also a beneficial experience with bonuses and privileges.
